https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/agadmkp2X35ST0fOA3zqUZqm3qC.jpg Contemporary art has become a trend for young people in China. Young artists often organize activities in the form of art groups or small groups â€” but this is not only looked down on by the government, but is also subject to punishments and restrictions. This film documents a gathering of more than 200 artists in Nanjing, all from different regions of China, who to engage in a modern art activity titled "Bask in the sunshine." Bask in the Sunshine
